publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2067 Richard Lochhead: The Licensing of Animal Dealers (Young Cats and Dogs) (Scotland) Regulations 2008—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the Licensing of Animal Dealers (Young Cats and Dogs) (Scotland) Regulations 2008 be approved. Supported by: Michael Russell*

S3M-2067 Richard Lochhead: The Licensing of Animal Dealers (Young Cats and Dogs) (Scotland) Regulations 2008—That the Rural Affairs and Environment Committee recommends that the Licensing of Animal Dealers (Young Cats and Dogs) (Scotland) Regulations 2008 be approved. Supported by: Michael Russell
